item.title: Codefuse-ChatBot Development by Private Knowledge Augmentation
item.description: ä¸­æ–‡&nbsp ï½œ &nbspEnglish&nbsp This project is an open-source AI intelligent assistant, specifically designed for the entire lifecycle of software development, covering design, coding, testing, deployment, and operations. Through knowledge retrieval, tool utilization, and sandbox execution, Codefuse-ChatBot can not only answer professional questions you encounter during the development process but also coordinate multiple independent, dispersed platforms through a conversational interface. ğŸ“œ Contents ğŸ¤ Introduction ğŸ§­ Technical Route ğŸ¤ Introduction ğŸ’¡ The aim of this project is to construct an AI intelligent assistant for the entire lifecycle of software development, covering design, coding, testing, deployment, and operations, through Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), Tool Learning, and sandbox environments.

TaskPlaning - Executorï¼Œä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆå³å¯ç»“æŸ Long-short term memory Managementï¼šMulti-Agentä¸å•Agentçš„å…³é”®åŒºåˆ«åœ¨äºï¼ŒMulti-Agentéœ€è¦å¤„ç†å¤§é‡çš„äº¤æµä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œç±»ä¼¼äººç±»å›¢é˜Ÿåä½œçš„è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚å¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªä¸“é—¨è´Ÿè´£å†…å®¹æ€»ç»“ï¼ˆç±»ä¼¼äºä¼šè®®åŠ©ç†ï¼‰çš„Agentï¼Œå¯¹é•¿æœŸè®°å¿†è¿›è¡Œæ€»ç»“å¹¶ææ›´æœ‰æ•ˆä¿¡æ¯ä¼ é€’ç»™ä¸‹ä¸€ä½Agentï¼Œè€Œéä¼ é€’æ‰€æœ‰å†…å®¹ç»™ä¸‹ä¸€ä½Agentã€‚ Human-agent interactionï¼šé¢å¯¹å¤æ‚åœºæ™¯æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦äººç±»ä»‹å…¥Agentäº¤äº’è¿‡ç¨‹å¹¶æä¾›åé¦ˆã€‚é€šè¿‡ä¸Šè¿° Long-short term memory Management å’Œ Agent Communication è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œä½¿LLMèƒ½å‡†ç¡®ç†è§£äººç±»çš„æ„å›¾ï¼Œä»è€Œæ›´æœ‰æ•ˆåœ°å®Œæˆä»»åŠ¡ã€‚ æ€»çš„æ¥è¯´ï¼Œè¿™äº”ä¸ªè¦ç´ å…±åŒæ„å»ºäº†ä¸€ä¸ªMulti Agentæ¡†æ¶ï¼Œç¡®ä¿Agentä¹‹é—´çš„åä½œæ›´åŠ ç´§å¯†å’Œé«˜æ•ˆï¼ŒåŒæ—¶ä¹Ÿèƒ½å¤Ÿé€‚åº”æ›´å¤æ‚çš„ä»»åŠ¡éœ€æ±‚å’Œæ›´å¤šæ ·çš„äº¤äº’åœºæ™¯ã€‚é€šè¿‡ç»„åˆå¤šä¸ªAgenté“¾è·¯æ¥å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´ä¸”å¤æ‚çš„é¡¹ç›®ä¸Šçº¿åœºæ™¯ï¼ˆDev Phaseï¼‰ï¼Œå¦‚Demand Chainï¼ˆCEOï¼‰ã€Product Arguement Chainï¼ˆCPOã€CFOã€CTOï¼‰ã€Engineer Group Chainï¼ˆSelectorã€Developer1~Nï¼‰ã€QA Engineer Chainï¼ˆDeveloperã€Testerï¼‰ã€Deploy Chainï¼ˆDeveloperã€Deploerï¼‰ã€‚

item.title: overview
item.description: HuggingFace | ModelScope Hello World! This is CodeFuse! CodeFuse aims to develop Code Large Language Models (Code LLMs) to support and enhance full-lifecycle AI native sotware developing, covering crucial stages such as design requirements, coding, testing, building, deployment, operations, and insight analysis. We are passionating about creating innovative open-source solutions that empower developers throughout the software development process as shown above. We also encourage engineers and researchers within this community to join us in co-constructing/improving CodeFuse.

item.title: QuickStart
item.description: ğŸš€ Quick Start Please install the Nvidia driver yourself; this project has been tested on Python 3.9.18, CUDA 11.7, Windows, and X86 architecture macOS systems. Preparation of Python environment It is recommended to use conda to manage the python environment (optional) # Prepare conda environment conda create --name Codefusegpt python=3.9 conda activate Codefusegpt Install related dependencies cd Codefuse-ChatBot # python=3.9ï¼Œuse notebook-latestï¼Œpython=3.8 use notebook==6.5.5 pip install -r requirements.txt Basic Configuration # Modify the basic configuration for service startup cd configs cp model_config.
